localString.value: This is a standard food ration
This is a cooked steak. You cannot tell which animal it came from.
Used as often in the peasant's home as the dungeon's dark, these simple concoctions are common throughout Faerun.

Greenfish are abundant in the seas that lap the coast of Nordock. While bland themselves, a concoction of pepper and other spices brings out a surprisingly tangy and pleasant flavor. This fish counts as a single food serving for resting purposes.
A large piece of meat has dislodged from the creature. It would not be wise to eat it. Perhaps if you cook it on a campfire it would be safe to consume.
A small drawer extends beneath the gleaming tabletop. It probably doubles as a desk when there's the need.
It is a simple chair but the grace of its lines speaks to the quality of its craftmanship.
It is a simple chair but the grace of its lines speaks to the quality of its craftmanship.
It is a simple chair but the grace of its lines speaks to the quality of its craftmanship.
